title: Determinants and progression of stigma in amyotrophic lateral sclerosis/motor neuron disease
details: CA Young, A Chaouch, CJ Mcdermott, A Al-Chalabi… - … Lateral Sclerosis and …, 2025
abstract: Objective: Stigma in amyotrophic lateral sclerosis/motor neurone disease (ALS/MND) may be felt or enacted; felt stigma covers feeling devalued by the illness, whereas enacted stigma refers to being treated differently because of it. Stigma in ALS/MND …

title: Refining Chronic Pain Phenotypes: A Comparative Analysis of Sociodemographic and Disease-Related Determinants Using Electronic Health Records
details: T Begum, B Veeranki, OJ Chike, S Tamang, JF Simard… - The Journal of Pain, 2025
abstract: The use of electronic health records (EHR) for chronic pain phenotyping has gained significant attention in recent years, with various algorithms being developed to enhance accuracy. Structured data fields (eg, pain intensity, treatment modalities …
